vsParam:
Ho ho!
Anise, I heard you're struggling with your assignment.

I am worried.
I feel ashamed, but I really can't manage it on my own...

Hmm, what's to be ashamed of?
That's when you ask for help from others.
You are more than welcomed to ask for our help.
Like Peppermint would actually do anything...

Hmm! What are you saying, [px]?
Of course I'll help!

Hehe, thank you, guys.
I am counting on you two.

What is it,
a flower seedling?

Yes. My assignment is to conduct an ecological survey,
but the seedling given to me by Sensei seems to be malnourished and withered...

Oh... Why don't you just do enough to
get by on assignments like that?

No way. As an apprentice sage, I can't have that kind of attitude!
Besides, this assignment was from Ru Sensei.

Ah, er... my apologies... No one can do just enough to
get by on work assigned by Ru Sensei, the perfectionist...

Uh... What should I do then?
Shall we go find another healthier flower?

No need... I heard that "Round Feces" can make
plants thrive if you use them for fertilizer.

I see.
You want that item, right?

Yes.
[px], can you help me with it?

Really!?
I'm counting on you then.

Hehe, [px], reliable as always.
I'm counting on you then.
